Text.val: 12.06.2013 GB SCR18206 Allow display scrollbar on the screen
08.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
28.09.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob to Unicode
29.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
05.04.2006 SH SCR10825 Changed handling to modify notes, now always
31.01.2005 SH SCR7752 Added new para PI.DCRM_DEPT_CODE
22.05.2002 SH Removed --> TRIM if Blob-Field read from table or stored to table,
-- If all text was deleted by USER, the according row in table
-- If DHRM_NOTICE will be cleared by USER, the according row
-- out of table DEBTOR_HELLER_REMARKS will be deleted

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,14}='Y','TRUE'LOG,Trim ({0,3})='' OR Trim ({0,3})=User (0) AND ({0,2}=Date () OR ISNULL ({0,2})) AND {1,4})
